title: Spacious & Inviting Duplex Near Suwałki Campus—Family Living with Student Comfort
description: Welcome to your warm and expansive duplex nestled in the peaceful Polnocne neighborhood of Suwałki. Boasting an ample 132 sqm, this inviting home features 3 comfortable bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms—ideal for maximizing privacy and convenience. Wheelchair accessible, with bright patio doors opening onto the garden, you’re offered seamless indoor-outdoor living. Relax in the shared courtyard, enjoy a safe fenced yard with your pets, or take in the scenery from the sunny rooftop deck—this home invites both calm and community-room for all.
neighborhood_description: Polnocne is especially appreciated for its relaxed atmosphere, strong sense of security, and breathtaking views towards the region’s gently rolling hills. The community fosters a close-knit, welcoming environment, making it ideal for those starting studies at local institutions or families seeking peace just outside city crowds. Essential amenities and swift highway access connect you with both Suwałki’s center and the beautiful surrounding natural landscapes.
lifestyle_benefits: space for group gatherings or hobbies
safe area ideal for families or sharing students
target_buyer: Perfect for a group of students desiring a welcoming, accessible place to share, or for families who value tranquility, security, and connection with nature just outside the hustle of Suwałki’s main areas.
market_positioning: This duplex stands out in the local market by merging college town practicality with rare comforts—fully accessible features, multiple bathrooms, flexible common spaces, and superior outdoor options in one of Suwałki’s more desirable, family- and student-friendly districts.
